name: PKPaymentRequestShippingContactUpdate
desc: An object that updates the payment request after the shipping contact information changes.

items.name: init(errors: [Error]?, paymentSummaryItems: [PKPaymentSummaryItem], shippingMethods: [PKShippingMethod])
items.desc: Creates a shipping contact update with your specified payment summary items and shipping methods.

items.name: var errors: [Error]!
items.desc: An array of shipping contact information errors that the user must resolve.
